about_the_game:
This is an adult visual novel series featuring a stunning red-haired futanari as the protagonist. In this episode, her girlfriend surprises her with an unexpected experience involving a glory hole.

GAME DESCRIPTION

After an intimate encounter, Kira reconnects with her ex, Evelyn, who invites her out to a bar for a special date.
Eager for a night of excitement, Kira agrees without hesitation.
As the evening unfolds and the drinks flow, Kira soon realizes there’s far more to the night than she anticipated.
How will she react when she discovers Evelyn has brought her to a glory hole?
And what happens when she sees her girlfriend passionately sucking a stranger’s cock through the wall?
Play our game to find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains straight sex scenes.
Sexual scenes involving transgender characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
